query:
SELECT 
  estado,
  COUNT(*) as cantidad
FROM planes_accion
GROUP BY estado;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user j2FTkFQTdFUnQgU.root --database TfZrNnU8ACksUNuSJSy8Lr --execute SELECT 
  estado,
  COUNT(*) as cantidad
FROM planes_accion
GROUP BY estado;
